title: Name this font?
content: Just wondering if anyone has ever seen the font that neubix.com uses for their logo? I’ve never seen this before. And if it’s wrong to post a site, I apologize ahead of time.
author: joesomebody

comments.content:
[This site](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110160440/http:/www.neubix.com/), in the top left corner?

I would say it’s custom work, derived from something like Chalet or pretty much any other rounded sans.

_[Larger and better quality pic here…](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110160440/http:/www.thebignoob.com/cms/images/blog-neubix.jpg)_
